mapper.select: SELECT H.SEQ_H seq_h, M.ID id, M.NAME name, M.PHONE phone FROM HOST H , MEMBER M WHERE M.SEQ_M = H.SEQ_M AND H.STATE ='Y'
SELECT H.SEQ_H seq_h, M.SEQ_M seq_m, R.ROOM_NAME room_name, H.STATE state FROM MEMBER M, HOST H, ROOM R WHERE M.SEQ_M = H.SEQ_M AND H.STATE='N'AND R.SEQ_H = H.SEQ_H
SELECT * FROM REQUIREMENTS ORDER BY SEQ_RQ DESC

SELECT A.SEQ_RE seq_re, M.NAME name, A.CHECK_IN check_in, A.CHECK_OUT check_out, A.PEOPLE people, M.PHONE phone FROM MEMBER M , (SELECT R2.SEQ_RE , R2.CHECK_IN , R2.CHECK_OUT , R2.PEOPLE , R2.SEQ_M FROM MEMBER M , HOST H , ROOM R , RESERVATION R2 WHERE M.SEQ_M = H.SEQ_M AND H.SEQ_H = R.SEQ_H AND R.SEQ_RM = R2.SEQ_RM AND M.ID =#{login}) A WHERE M.SEQ_M = A.SEQ_M
